metadata.title: CVE-2016-4608 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
libxslt in Apple iOS before 9.3.3, OS X before 10.11.6, iTunes before12.4.2 on Windows, iCloud before 5.2.1 on Windows, tvOS before 9.2.2, andwatchOS before 2.2.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknownvectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-4607, CVE-2016-4609,CVE-2016-4610, and CVE-2016-4612.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4608` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxslt1.1 - 1.1.28-2.1ubuntu0.1
python-libxslt1 - 1.1.28-2.1ubuntu0.1
xsltproc - 1.1.28-2.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxslt package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.28-2.1ubuntu0.1').
